item.title: Aisera Scheduled Maintenance Notification
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Planned Maintenance for Aisera Platform Summary: A scheduled service maintenance for Aisera Platform is planned for March 29 from 17:00 to 20:00 PST. During this maintenance, some services will be impacted as they get upgraded. Users may encounter "under maintenance" responses.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 29, 17:00 - 20:00 PDT

Feb 28, 12:09 PST
Scheduled - We have a planned service maintenance for Aisera Platform scheduled for:

March 29 from 17:00 to 20:00 PST.

During this maintenance, the services mentioned below are expected to be impacted as they get upgraded. Users may encounter "under maintenance" responses throughout the maintenance period.

item.title: Aisera Scheduled Maintenance Notification
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Planned Service Maintenance on Aisera Platform

A scheduled service maintenance for Aisera Platform is planned for March 8 from 17:00 to 19:00 PST. During this time, users may experience "under maintenance" responses.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 8, 17:00 - 19:00 PST

Feb 28, 12:09 PST
Scheduled - We have a planned service maintenance for Aisera Platform scheduled for:

March 8 from 17:00 to 19:00 PST.

During this maintenance, the services mentioned below are expected to be impacted as they get upgraded. Users may encounter "under maintenance" responses throughout the maintenance period.

item.title: Aisera Scheduled Maintenance Notification
item.content:encoded:
Here is the output in the correct format: [Low] - Scheduled Maintenance

Summary: Scheduled maintenance is underway for the Aisera Platform from 17:00 to 19:00 PDT. Some services may be impacted, and users could encounter "under maintenance" messages during this time.

Feb 20, 18:37 PST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 20, 17:00 PST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 15, 13:53 PST
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Feb 20, 17:00 PST
Scheduled - We have a planned service maintenance for Aisera Platform scheduled for:

February 20 from 17:00 to 19:00 PDT.

During this maintenance, the services mentioned below are expected to be impacted as they get upgraded. Users may encounter "under maintenance" responses throughout the maintenance period.

item.title: Degraded Performance
item.content:encoded:
Feb 9, 10:53 PST
Resolved - The issue has been resolved. We will provide RCA soon.

Feb 9, 10:52 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 9, 10:44 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 9, 10:43 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Timeout accessing Aisera Admin UI
item.content:encoded:
Feb 6, 12:28 PST
Resolved - We have resolved the incident and we are monitoring.

Feb 6, 12:02 PST
Investigating - Some Aisera customers are experiencing a timeout error when accessing the Aisera admin webpage. We are aware of this issue and are working to solve it.
